00037 #ifndef EGS_GTRANSFORMED_
00038 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00041 #include "egs_transformations.h"
00042 
00043 #ifdef WIN32
00044 
00045 #ifdef BUILD_GTRANSFORMED_DLL
00046 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00047 #else
00048 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00049 #endif
00050 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_LOCAL
00051 
00052 #else
00053 
00054 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY
00055 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00056 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility ("hidden")))

00058 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT
00059 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_LOCAL

00101 class EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT EGS_TransformedGeometry :
00102             public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00103 
00104 protected:
00105 
00106     EGS_BaseGeometry    *g;   
00107     EGS_AffineTransform T;    
00108     string              type; 
00109 
00110 public:
00111 
00115     EGS_TransformedGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G, const EGS_AffineTransform &t,
00116             const string &Name = "") : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), g(G), T(t) {
00117         type = g->getType(); type += "T"; nreg = g->regions();
00118         is_convex = g->isConvex();
00119         has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00120     };
00121 
00122     ~EGS_TransformedGeometry() { if( !g->deref() ) delete g; };
00123 
00124     void setTransformation(const EGS_AffineTransform &t) { T = t; };
00125 
00126     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &x,
00127             const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00128         EGS_Vector xt(x), ut(u);
00129         T.inverseTransform(xt); T.rotateInverse(ut);
00130         return g->computeIntersections(ireg,n,xt,ut,isections);
00131         //return g->computeIntersections(ireg,n,x*T,u*T.getRotation(),isections);
00132     };
00133     bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00134         return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00135     };
00136     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00137         EGS_Vector xt(x); T.inverseTransform(xt);
00138         return g->isInside(xt);
00139         //return g->isInside(x*T);
00140     };
00141     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00142         EGS_Vector xt(x); T.inverseTransform(xt);
00143         return g->isWhere(xt);
00144         //return g->isWhere(x*T);
00145     };
00146     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00147 
00148     int medium(int ireg) const { return g->medium(ireg); };
00149 
00150     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00151             const EGS_Vector &u) {
00152         return ireg >= 0 ? g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x*T,u*T.getRotation()) : 0;
00153     };
00154     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00155            EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00156         EGS_Vector xt(x), ut(u);
00157         T.inverseTransform(xt); T.rotateInverse(ut);
00158         int inew = g->howfar(ireg,xt,ut,t,newmed,normal);
00159         //int inew = g->howfar(ireg,x*T,u*T.getRotation(),t,newmed,normal);
00160         if( inew != ireg && normal )
00161             *normal = T.getRotation()*(*normal);
00162         return inew;
00163     };
00164 
00165     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00166         EGS_Vector xt(x); T.inverseTransform(xt);
00167         return g->hownear(ireg,xt);
00168         //return g->hownear(ireg,x*T);
00169     };
00170 
00171     int getMaxStep() const { return g->getMaxStep(); };
00172 
00173     // Not sure about the following.
00174     // If I leave the implementation that way, all transformed copies of a
00175     // geometry share the same boolean properties. But that may not be
00176     // what the user wants. So, I should implement both options:
00177     // all copies share the same properties and the user has the options
00178     // to define separate properties for each copy.
00179     bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00180         return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00181     };
00182     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop) {
00183         g->setBooleanProperty(prop);
00184     };
00185     void addBooleanProperty(int bit) {
00186         g->addBooleanProperty(bit);
00187     };
00188     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop, int start, int end, int step=1) {
00189         g->setBooleanProperty(prop,start,end,step);
00190     };
00191     void addBooleanProperty(int bit, int start, int end, int step=1) {
00192         g->addBooleanProperty(bit,start,end,step);
00193     };
00194 
00195     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00196 
00197     EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00198         return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00199     }
00200     void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00201 
00202     void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00203 
00204     virtual void getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00205 
00206 protected:
00207 
00214     void setMedia(EGS_Input *inp,int,const int *);
00215 
00216 };
00217 
00218 #endif
